metadata.title: CVE-2019-9215 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Live555 before 2019.02.27, malformed headers lead to invalid memoryaccess in the parseAuthorizationHeader function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbasicusageenvironment1 - 2018.11.26-1.1
libgroupsock8 - 2018.11.26-1.1
liblivemedia64 - 2018.11.26-1.1
libusageenvironment3 - 2018.11.26-1.1
livemedia-utils - 2018.11.26-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblivemedia package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2018.11.26-1.1').
